Gumdrop
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry

  • Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry 
    Package Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop
    Core framework for the Gumdrop multipurpose Java server.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp
    FTP (File Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http
    HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.websocket
    WebSocket protocol implementation (RFC 6455).
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap
    IMAP4rev2 server implementation for Gumdrop.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3
    POP3 (Post Office Protocol version 3) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.session
    HTTP session management and cluster replication.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
    SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry
    OpenTelemetry implementation for Gumdrop.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.metrics
    OpenTelemetry Metrics implementation for Gumdrop.
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.protobuf
    Protocol Buffers encoding and decoding for OTLP.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop 
    Class Description
    TelemetryConfig
    Top-level telemetry configuration for Gumdrop.
    Trace
    Represents a distributed trace.

  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry 
    Class Description
    Attribute
    A key-value attribute for spans, events, or resources.
    ErrorCategory
    Standardized error categories for telemetry across all protocols.
    LogRecord
    A log record that can be associated with a span.
    Span
    Represents a single operation within a trace.
    Span.SpanScope
    A scope that restores the previous current span when closed.
    SpanContext
    Immutable context identifying a span within a trace.
    SpanEvent
    An event occurring during a span's lifetime.
    SpanKind
    Indicates the role of a span in a trace.
    SpanLink
    A link to a span in another trace.
    SpanStatus
    Represents the status of a span.
    TelemetryConfig
    Top-level telemetry configuration for Gumdrop.
    TelemetryExporter
    Interface for exporting trace, log, and metric data.
    Trace
    Represents a distributed trace.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.metrics

    A key-value attribute for spans, events, or resources.
